title: For Sale High Grade B-18 Blankets
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: For Sale High Grade B-18 Blankets
posts.post_content: Hi this post is for anyone looking to complete or work on a high grade B-18 set.  I have the entire set including too many duplicates to name. I have no red infields for sale . If anyone needs any filler for their set or are looking for a particular player please email me. All of my duplicates are high grade with full brown borders, no pin or stitich holes and are generally very nice .
